featured.text: They made the statues in the temples drink wine as they wished.
32 Food offerings are presented at house altars and temples.
The temple celebrated Mazu Festival by hosting ten days of lion dances, Taiwanese operas, and traditional hand ______ shows.
This explains why at that time the priests even built magic devices into their temples.

definition.zh_def: 寺廟；供奉神明或進行宗教儀式的建築。
definition.en_def: A building used for religious worship, especially in religions such as Buddhism and Hinduism.
definition.example: The ancient temple was filled with beautiful carvings and statues.
